{{recipe.name}}
import {Component, Injectable} from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http"; import {DataViewModule} from 'primeng/dataview'; import {Recipe} from "../model/recipe"; @Injectable({ providedIn: 'root', }) @Component({ selector: 'app-recipe-service', templateUrl: './recipe-service.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipe-service.component.css'] }) export class RecipeServiceComponent { constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} recipes = {} as Recipe[]; getRecipes() { return this.http.get('http://localhost:8080/recipe'); } }
